```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(plotly)

x <- seq(-2*pi, 2*pi, length.out = 1000)
df <- data.frame(x, y1 = sin(x), y2 = cos(x))

fig <- plot_ly(df, x = ~x)
fig <- fig %>% add_lines(y = ~y1, name = "☐Sin", line = list(color = "blue"), visible = TRUE)
fig <- fig %>% add_lines(y = ~y2, name = "☐Cos", line = list(color = "red"), visible = TRUE)

fig <- fig %>% layout(
  title = "Sine and Cosine Functions",
  xaxis = list(domain = c(0.1, 1)),
  yaxis = list(title = "y"),
  updatemenus = list(
    list(
      type = "checkbox",
      y = 1.2,
      items = list(
        list(
          label = "Show Sine",
          args = list("visible", list(TRUE, FALSE)),
          execute = TRUE
        ),
        list(
          label = "Show Cosine",
          args = list("visible", list(FALSE, TRUE)),
          execute = TRUE
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

fig

```
